issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:

fields.environment: Linux  2.6.21.7-2.fc8xen #1 SMP Fri Feb 15 12:39:36 EST 2008 i686 GNU/Linux, ec2 small instance

comments.body: Note that the error occurs with build off trunk (svn rev 898899) as well.
assumption that all single-threaded executors have an unbounded queue is no longer valid.  this patch provides a policy for dealing with single thread executors w/ a full queue.
version for trunk w/ more comments & a unit test.  will backport when i commit to 0.5.

from irc:

rdaum> that patch works
